title: Buttered Brussels Sprouts
summary: Buttered Brussels Sprouts might be just the side dish you are searching for. For 80 cents per serving, this recipe covers 15% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 8. One serving contains 86 calories, 4g of protein, and 5g of fat. It is brought to you by Epicurious. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian diet. Only a few people made this recipe, and 1 would say it hit the spot. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 25 minutes. Overall, this recipe earns a good spoonacular score of 52%. Try Orange-buttered Brussels Sprouts, Baby Brussels Sprouts with Buttered Pecans, and Lemon Infused Buttered Brussels Sprouts W/ Crisp Peppered Bacon for similar recipes.
instructions: Preparation                                                        Cook Brussels sprouts in a large pot of boiling salted water until just tender, 8 to 10 minutes. Drain in a colander and toss with butter and salt and pepper to taste.

steps.step: Cook Brussels sprouts in a large pot of boiling salted water until just tender, 8 to 10 minutes.
Drain in a colander and toss with butter and salt and pepper to taste.
